Kankurō attacks his opponent using close-range [[taijutsu]], then, as his face begins to crack, Kankurō is revealed to be [[Kuroari]] in disguise, and the real Kankurō is controlling the puppet from within the cloth on his back. Kankurō then uses Kuroari to capture the opponent.
